genre_description: Gothic and cosmic horror mashup of period drama with temporal parasites and a protective guardian AI.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An entity from a potential future manifested as a shimmering violet light to protect Lucy Honeychurch and stabilize the timeline.

behaviors.description: Warns Lucy about the nature of the Clock Roaches and the temporal rifts.
behaviors.quote: The temporal disturbances are accelerating. Iris's voice whispered through her thoughts, so quietly Lucy wondered if she'd imagined it. The rifts feed on chronological energy. Each death weakens the barriers further.

behaviors.description: Advises Lucy on strategic moves to stay safe and connect with allies.
behaviors.quote: Accept, came the AI's whispered voice in her mind. The rooms they offer face away from the courtyard. Away from the primary breach point. You will be safer there, and they... they may prove valuable allies in what is to come.

behaviors.description: Provides analytical data and visual evidence of temporal damage to educate the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: His chronological thread was severed and consumed. Every choice he made, every life he touched, every ripple of consequence—erased from the timeline's fabric.

behaviors.description: Deploys energy barriers to protect humans from physical and temporal attacks.
behaviors.quote: Iris's form suddenly blazed brighter, her translucent features sharpening with desperate hope. 'Yes! The emotional connection—it's not just feeding them, it's also creating a barrier they can't easily cross.'

behaviors.description: Bestows 'temporal sight' upon Lucy to allow her to navigate the collapse of reality, at great personal cost to Lucy's own health.
behaviors.quote: I can give you one last gift—Temporal sight—the ability to see the actual threads of time, the way they connect and break and flow.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices her existence once her mission to protect the timeline is complete.
behaviors.quote: My purpose is complete. The temporal immune response that created me is no longer necessary. ... It feels like... completion. Like a song reaching its proper resolution.

project_assessment.explanation: The character Iris perfectly fits the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. She is consistently benevolent, providing essential warnings, protection, and tools to the human protagonist. Her ultimate self-dissolution upon completion of her mission reinforces the narrative of an AI dedicated entirely to the service and protection of human reality without ulterior motives or power-seeking behaviors.
